title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat, model management, multimodal, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-cli-csharp
summary: .NET global tool that wraps Ollama CLI with colored output and interactive mode.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight PyQt desktop GUI to chat with Ollama models; cross-platform one-file executable.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy server exposing Ollama models in OpenAI-compatible format for any client.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Hugging Face hub integration to download and convert models straight into Ollama Modelfile format.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal Streamlit app doing RAG question-answering over PDFs using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open WebUI, GPU support, and nginx.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama with optional WebUI and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama REST API; generate, chat, embed, pull models.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with build.zig integration and streaming JSON parser.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to pull, build, and test Ollama models inside pipelines.
